en.title: FE Welcomes QP Wearers, Famous Filipino US Based Singers, Lani Misalucha & Gloria Papin!
en.content:
QP Wearers Lani Misalucha and Gloria Papin with Nevada State Licensee Mr Benjamin Cuaresma (extreme left in blue)  
Lani Misalucha is the one of the best singers from the Philippines currently performing in the United States where she also resides. She holds shows at the Flamingo Las Vegas with the veteran Hawaiian variety troupe Society of Seven. She was dubbed Asia's Nightingale by MTV Asia.

Misalucha's depth (vocal strength held in reserve) and wide range have been frequently compared to those of popular divas such as Whitney Houston, Celine Dion and Barbra Streisand.

In March 2008, Misalucha was voted "Best Singer" in the 27th Annual Best of Las Vegas poll conducted on 8,000 respondents by the Las Vegas Review Journal.
 
International singer Gloria Papin, known for her soulful love songs is one of the most sought after singer in concerts and gatherings of Filipinos in the U.S. She regularly holds seven concerts a year, mostly in the U.S.
